entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
